header.title: Capitalism, Inequality, and Martin Luther King

title: Capitalism, Inequality, and Martin Luther King
content:
Updates on Detroit’s water shutoffs, corporations prioritize profit at people’s expense (4 big examples), US Senators… making money, economics of ebola, and hedge funds pay fines with pensioners’ money.
Interview: Dr Obery hendricks, Jr., on Martin Luther King, Jr.
’s lifelong criticism of capitalism and preference for democratic socialism.
Response to listeners on (1) economics of the disabled (productivity and wages) and (2) reduced 2014 deficit in US.
